ie.gmit.sw

Class FileToShingleParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Parser
      • ie.gmit.sw.FileParser
        • ie.gmit.sw.FileToShingleParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShingleCreator, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileToShingleParser
extends FileParser
implements java.lang.Runnable, ShingleCreator
    FileToShingleParser possesses the implementation of the parse method provided by FileParser. It also contains the implementation of the shinglize method outlined in ShingleCreator interface.
    Author:
    Daire Ní Chatháin

                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        file - file name
        q - Shingles, once created are added to this queue
        shingleSize - The size of the shingles to be created from the file
